```{r}
install.packages("igraph")
library(igraph)
datEL <- read.csv(file.choose(), header = TRUE)
el <- as.matrix(datEL)
el[,1] <- as.character(el[,1])
el[,2] <- as.character(el[,2])
g <- graph.edgelist(el, directed = FALSE)
plot(g)

```
